description: Lists all the job steps for a JCL file to restart a batch job. This is only applicable for Micro Focus engine with versions 8.0.6 and above.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the application.

parameters.name: executionId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the batch job execution.

nested_items.name: batchJobSteps
nested_items.description: Returns all the batch job steps and related information for a batch job that previously ran.

nested_items.name: procStepName
nested_items.description: The name of a procedure step.

nested_items.name: procStepNumber
nested_items.description: The number of a procedure step.

nested_items.name: stepCheckpoint
nested_items.description: A registered step-level checkpoint identifier that can be used for restarting an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: stepCheckpointStatus
nested_items.description: The step-level checkpoint status for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: stepCheckpointTime
nested_items.description: The step-level checkpoint status for an Amazon Web Services Blu Age application batch job.

nested_items.name: stepCondCode
nested_items.description: The condition code of a step.

nested_items.name: stepRestartable
nested_items.description: Specifies if a step can be restarted or not.
